keyPolicies.policyDescription: Too many people in West Ham struggle with high rents and poor housing. I will work to ensure a real mix of affordable, attractive homes that are fit for families.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: TRANSPORT THAT MEETS ALL OUR NEEDS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Our public transport is being let down by the Labour Mayor and local government. Crossrail has been delayed and services are overcrowded. I will push for better services across buses, Tube and DLR, and to ensure upgrades happen on time and on budget.

As an business owner, I know how important small businesses are to our economy - creating jobs and paying taxes to fund our public services. I will fight against unfair regulations and costs that punish local entrepreneurs.

housing.content: Too many people in West Ham struggle with high rents and poor housing. I will work to ensure a real mix of affordable, attractive homes that are fit for families.

images.caption: Sara Kumar with residents and local area imagery
